resources.string: You need to download colors to continue
Click on the pack you want to download in order to launch the download.\nYou must have access to internet.
Enter a hexadecimal code respecting the syntax :\n#ffffff or #FFFFFF.
You can choose between viewing the colors database or shooting a photo.\nYou must have some colors in your database.
You can see here all the colors in your database.
You must enter each color value respecting the syntax : 123.\nr = red, g = green, b = blue.\nYou must write zeros if your rgb value contains some.
Enter a hexadecimal code respecting the syntax :\n#ffffff or #FFFFFF.\nrgb values will be printed in the corresponding color.
Select an option.\nYou can have the color from number values (hexadecimal or rgb) or make conversions.
